description: A suspected Romano-British temple located besides Badbury Rings. Dating is suggested by coin evidence found in the temple.
bibliography: Earthworks of Romano-British Temple SW of Badbury Rings, Kingston Lacy Estate, available at: https://heritagerecords.nationaltrust.org.uk/HBSMR/MonRecord.aspx?uid=MNA138090
Martyn, Blick, Brindle, et al, (2015), Badbury Romano-Celtic temple (Dorset), available at: https://doi.org/10.5284/1030449
(2014), The Romano-Celtic Temple at Badbury Rings, Dorset, 135, pg. 242-71
Papworth, (2000), Evaluation excavation, Badbury Romano-Celtic temple: interim report, Poceedings of the Dorset Natural History and Archaeological Society, 122
Papworth, (01/12/2013), An interesting site, available at: https://archaeologynationaltrustsw.wordpress.com/2013/07/06/camping-at-badbury-temple/
